column4: can i get some help in setting up my screen settings, it is set at default
i need to setup my screen settings
System > Preferences > Screen Resolution
do you have an nvidia graphics card?
when you go to Screen Resolution, what resolutions do you see?
only?
type sudo gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf
in the menu go to Search > Find
search for 640x480
in gedit, not in ubuntu
in the Section "Screen" part?
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org
you won't get help in pastebin
you can just paste some stuff
did you see the 640x480 text?
ok.. after the "640x480" text press space and insert "800x600"
in all the lines under Section "Screen"
it should say Modes     "640x480"
what does it say beside Device?
hmm, it should work..
you probably didn't type sudo before gedit
